author: Ania Bessonov
title: Is my mask reusable if I leave it out? Your COVID-19 questions answered
description: We're answering your questions about the pandemic. Send yours to COVID@cbc.ca, and we’ll publish a selection of answers every weekday online, and also put some questions to the experts during The National and on CBC News Network.
content:
We're answering your questions about the pandemic. Send yours to COVID@cbc.ca, and we'll publish a selection of answers every weekday online, and also put some questions to the experts during The National and on CBC News Network.
